labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Bug is reproducable on both Linux and Windows. Arch Linux 4.12.6-1-ARCH / Windows 7 SP1 Build 7601
data.client_settings: Web client as of 2017-08-26 on Vivaldi 1.11.917.39 (Linux) / 1.8.770.56 (Windows)
data.actual_result: Clicking on any channel or server icon doesn't work, the UI is stuck displaying the channel you were on last.
data.expected_result: UI works normally, changing channels or servers should update the UI.
data.short_description: Cancelling a file upload from the webapp, and then the file picker afterwards causes the UI to stop updating.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open file picker, select file, and confirm selection - Cancel upload in webapp - Open file picker again - Cancel selection from file picker itself.
